title: (Church Sings) Hallowed Be Thy Name
lyrics:
(Church Sings) Hallowed be thy name
(Lead sings) Jesus Jesus all the way
(Church Sings) Hallowed be thy name
(Lead Sings) Thy kingdom come Thy will be done
(Church Sings) Hallowed be thy name
(Lead singer may also use below and freestyle)
You are the rock in the weary land
You are the bright and the morning star
You are the lily of the valley
I command my hands to praise the Lordâ€¦
